markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ooze](/Traits.aspx?ID=122)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 634 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

Oozes are creatures with simple anatomies. They tend to have low mental ability scores and immunity to [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effects and precision damage.
name: Ooze
